attributes.action: make it illegal for any compensation payments arising out of the fundamentally flawed decision to prosecute the world champion (and other) jockey(s) over race fixing to be paid by the taxpayer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The CPS has demonstrated, yet again, that the lawyers on the taxpayer payroll are making fundamentally flawed decisions BECAUSE THEY KNOW THEY WILL NOT BE REQUIRED TO PAY THE CONSEQUENTIAL COMPENSATION BILL WHEN THEIR CASE IS THROWN OUT.  It is time that the taxpayer was taken out of being responsible for the failings of these people.  The individual who made the authoritative decision to go ahead with the prosecution is the person who should pay the compensation.
